Localization.Name: UltiFlex
Localization.Description: Been around for a couple hundred years. Survival company that makes knives. Got their start by making combat knives for the UEE Army. Expanded their operations to the public after decades of proud service.

English.Name: UltiFlex
English.Description: Been around for a couple hundred years. Survival company that makes knives. Got their start by making combat knives for the UEE Army. Expanded their operations to the public after decades of proud service.

Localization.Name: FSK-8 Combat Knife
Localization.Description:
Manufacturer: UltiFlex
Item Type: Knife
Class: Melee

Size: 16 cm

The FSK-8 Combat Knife from UltiFlex is as sparse a weapon as you can get. While many become enamored with dazzling tech of modern weaponry, UltiFlex has focused on making a simple effective combat tool. Featuring a balanced 1055 carbon steel blade honed to a razor's edge, this knife is capable of handling all the abuse you can throw at it.
